summary: Test suite that verifies the behavior of the MODFLOW 6 multimodel partition generation utilities, checking error handling, correct partitioning for one‑dimensional arrays, handling of short axes, and generation of two‑dimensional structured and unstructured partitions.
business_intent: Guarantee accurate and robust spatial domain partitioning for MODFLOW 6 multimodel simulations, preventing runtime errors and ensuring correct grid subdivision across various dimensional scenarios.
